This chart indicates the origin of Money Supply in Ceylon.

(a) "Government Finance"—shows the claims of the Banking system on the Government net of the shift of rupee cash between the Government and the public. (b) "Credit to Public"—shows the claims of the Banking system on the private sector net of change in Time and Savings deposits. In I964, external banking assets were negative in January, March to July and in September.
